variable.name: RUN_REFRESH
variable.value: org.netbeans.modules.vcs.profiles.vss.commands.SSCommand.class "dir=$[? EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER] [${EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER}] [${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []]" -silent cd ${OPTIONS} "${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []" &&

variable.name: RUNCDF_NMK
variable.value: org.netbeans.modules.vcs.profiles.vss.commands.SSCommand.class "dir=${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []$[? FILE] [${PS}${FILE}] []" cd ${OPTIONS} "${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []$[? FILE] [${PS}${FILE}] []" &&

variable.name: CONFIG_INPUT_DESCRIPTOR
